A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It seems people are divided most on the direction of this film. To me it was a director doing whatever he wanted without staying true to the saga or trilogy it was apart of. The poignant moments you expect from star wars were replaced with jokes better suited for a parody video or Space Balls. Some CGI moments were really bad. Parts of the script were terrible. Certain moments/situations were just ridiculous. The fact that a (non-spin-off) Star Wars movie was allowed to be made this way is baffling to me. More specific details would include spoilers...
